snippet.title: Sid Meier's Civilization VII Firaxis Developer Interview 'Building the World' - FGS Gamescom 2024
snippet.description:
As part of our partnership with Sid Meier's Civilization VII, the team at Firaxis Games shared a video about building the game's world. Sid Meier's Civilization VII is coming to PC and consoles on February 11, 2025.

https://www.youtube.com/@FutureGamesShow

#Civilization7 #FutureGamesShow #FGS #futuregamesshow2024 #gamescom
